response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your operations. Given its exceptional capabilities and the value it brings, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $995,000. This is a special opportunity to secure a cutting-edge solution at a discounted rate, tailored to meet your specific needs. I look forward to discussing how this product can revolutionize your business processes. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 995000}
